MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the L9 postcode area of Liverpool. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 12:54pm. Our next available engineer will attend site and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 4pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:50pm on 10th March 2021.
